name: SqrFil
description:
HOW TO PLAY:
You goal is to fill all the squares in the grid, before the timer runs out!
Move with the ARROW Keys (or WASD)
Use SPACE to undo any move
Press M to mute audio

In the Menu:
Press E or H to select difficulty
Press SPACE to go to the next page

This game was made for the LOWREZJAM 2022!

I was heavily inspired by a game I played last year that had the same basic concept, infact you can even see the comment I left describing what I wanted to do with this game: https://itch.io/jam/lowrezjam-2021/rate/1159259#post-4272423

Otherwise all music/graphics was made by me, with the expetion of the font used to display the score at the end.
